mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store ( merchant_num, store_nm, branch_nm, business_category_num, business_category_nm, business_subcategory_num, business_subcategory_nm, business_subsubcategory_num, business_subsubcategory_nm, standard_industry_num, standard_industry_nm, province_num, province_nm, city_num, city_nm, administrative_district_num, administrative_district_nm, legal_district_num, legal_district_nm, lot_num, land_classification_num, land_classification_nm, lot_main_num, lot_sub_num, lot_add, road_name_num, road_nm, building_main_num, building_sub_num, building_management_num, building_nm, road_name_add, old_postal_num, new_postal_num, neighborhood_info, floor_info, unit_info, longitude, latitude ) VALUES ( #{merchantNum}, #{storeNm}, #{branchNm}, #{businessCategoryNum}, #{businessCategoryNm}, #{businessSubcategoryNum}, #{businessSubcategoryNm}, #{businessSubsubcategoryNum}, #{businessSubsubcategoryNm}, #{standardIndustryNum}, #{standardIndustryNm}, #{provinceNum}, #{provinceNm}, #{cityNum}, #{cityNm}, #{administrativeDistrictNum}, #{administrativeDistrictNm}, #{legalDistrictNum}, #{legalDistrictNm}, #{lotNum}, #{landClassificationNum}, #{landClassificationNm}, #{lotMainNum}, #{lotSubNum}, #{lotAdd}, #{roadNameNum}, #{roadNm}, #{buildingMainNum}, #{buildingSubNum}, #{buildingManagementNum}, #{buildingNm}, #{roadNameAdd}, #{oldPostalNum}, #{newPostalNum}, #{neighborhoodInfo}, #{floorInfo}, #{unitInfo}, #{longitude}, #{latitude} )
mapper.select: SELECT store_nm, business_category_num, business_category_nm, road_name_add, floor_info, longitude, latitude, event FROM store;
